item.description:
## Current Release Notes * Bump SharpCompress
## Release Notes 1.27 * Update dependencies * HOI4 1.17 CS support * Stellaris 4.2 CS support * EU5 mod management support * Proton game launching on Linux * Optional GenerateSteamAppId flag to create steam_appid.txt when missing (used for enabling Steam activity tracking when launching games directly; off by default) * Added StoragePath setting to customize where Irony stores and reads its data * Irony is now Flatpak-aware (detects and supports Steam Flatpak installations)
